trans-unit.source: The types in the <see cref="N:System.Runtime.Caching.Hosting" /> namespace support .NET Framework hosting environments that use the caching features in ASP.NET.
trans-unit.target: Os tipos no namespace <see cref="N:System.Runtime.Caching.Hosting" /> são compatíveis com ambientes de hospedagem do .NET Framework que usam recursos de cache no ASP.NET.

trans-unit.source: The base <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.ObjectCache> class exposes a static <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.ObjectCache.Host%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: A base de <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.ObjectCache> classe expõe um estático <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.ObjectCache.Host%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: When a .NET Framework hosting environment starts individual application domains, it can set a reference to the <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.ObjectCache.Host%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Quando um ambiente de hospedagem do .NET Framework domínios de aplicativo individuais é iniciado, ele pode definir uma referência o <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.ObjectCache.Host%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: This enables the hosting environment to provide better integration with the cache.
trans-unit.target: Isso permite que o ambiente de hospedagem fornecer melhor integração com o cache.

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)], the <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.Hosting> namespace provides interfaces that a hosting environment can use to set a <xref:System.IServiceProvider> reference on the <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.ObjectCache.Host%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Em [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)], o <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.Hosting> namespace fornece interfaces que um ambiente de hospedagem pode utilizar para definir um <xref:System.IServiceProvider> referência sobre o <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.ObjectCache.Host%2A> propriedade.
